title: How much BTS ARMYS are there in the world? I know its difficult to answer.. LOL - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, the exact number is hard to tell because of differences between types of fans but according to a data there are 48 million authentic users mentioning bts over the period. However I also read somewhere that there are 134 million army's in the world but the authenticity of data is not confirmed by me. Hope it helps🙏
